alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 3:46PM EST until January 13 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Litchfield County. In New York, Western Greene, Western Ulster and Eastern Dutchess Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur in higher terrain areas and along north and west facing slopes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster
